name: Yayoi Nanatsuki
description: When playing an Artifact card: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. If two of your characters on the field already have an equipped Artifact, you additionally spend 1 less Elemental Die (Once per Round).
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When playing an {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact card:</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die. If two of your characters on the field already have an equipped {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact, you additionally spend 1 less Elemental Die (Once per Round).
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When playing an {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact card:</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die. If two of your characters on the field already have an equipped {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact, you additionally spend 1 less Elemental Die (Once per Round).
storytext: "If my skill can reach that apex, I am sure that my lacquerware will bear out the pattern of the truth..."
